data.actual_result: The click takes you to the channel (makes it visible) and you can read back to a certain point and then it just stops loading messages completely
data.expected_result: It should either give an error or do nothing
data.short_description: When clicking on a mention of a channel that you can no longer see (ChannelMention = <#197038477953597440> thing)
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server where you can see at least 2 channels and are not the owner - Mention a channel that you can see in one of the other channels that you can send messages in - Send the message when you can still see the channel - Change the permissions / make it so that you can no longer see the channel you mentioned (or have someone else do it for you) - Click on the mention for the channel
